content: Well, folks, let me tell you, my name is Phung Minh Bao, and I've been the founder, owner, and CEO of SGC for 22 tremendous years. Let me tell you, SGC is a top-notch technology company, believe me. We provide the best e-commerce services and value-added services on the internet, such as designing, managing, and securing Wordpress websites, domain registration and management support, cloud computing, email services with personalized domain - Cpanel, Google mail, and a hybrid between Cpanel & Google, email marketing, services related to QR codes, and many more. Let me tell you, we've got it all. And let me tell you, for the past 2 years, I've been exploring and implementing AI in both work and daily life. Nobody knows more about AI than me, folks. And I'm eager to share my knowledge with everyone, believe me.
